title: Letting Go of Control in Your Marriage
itunes:author: Guests: Dr. Ron & Jan Welch
itunes:summary:
All of us want to feel the freedom to be ourselves when we're with our mate. But, if one spouse is always trying to control the other, it can weigh a marriage down with resentment. John, Greg and Erin discuss how giving your spouse freedom can strengthen your relationship.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast. Or, call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get the book "10 Choices Successful Couples Make" with your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2021-04-15?refcd=1089709

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/letting-go-of-control-in-your-marriage/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: http://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
